name: Drift Experience Japan
description:
Drift Experience Japan is a small, experience oriented game.
This free Experience presents modern Assets developed by gifted creators using the unreal Engine 5.

Go FULL SEND Drifting in the streets around japan!

In Drift Experience Japan you can control a drift car. Experience the streets around Haruna and Gunma.
Choose between 2 sprint circuits, customize your car, choose between day and night and let your tires smoke!

Customization

Fully customize your car. Change tires, different body parts, paint or select a prebuild setup!

Drift

The car has an arcade drift handling and can be controlled by keyboard or gamepad.

Tracks

Choose between the streets of Gunma or around Haruna. The 2 long sprint circuits can be driven in daylight or at night.


  • 2 sprint circuits in japan
  • day / night settings
  • car customizing
  • arcade drift physics
  • collect drift points
